engChrName: To make it short, I think it's safe to assume the thing Giacomo made off with is the orbment you're lookin' for.
engSearchText:
To make it short, I think it's safe to assume the thing
Giacomo made off with is the orbment you're
lookin' for.
jpnChrName: ──“問題のブツ”ってのが あんたの捜し物なのは間違いねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
──“問題のブツ”ってのが
あんたの捜し物なのは間違いねえだろ。

engChrName: We know it was stolen from an antique shop a week ago by a gang of punks.
engSearchText:
We know it was stolen from an antique shop a week
ago by a gang of punks.
jpnChrName: 一週間前、そいつを 某古物商から盗んだのは半グレども。
jpnSearchText:
一週間前、そいつを
某古物商から盗んだのは半グレども。

engChrName: Said punks then met with a pair of others to deliver it and, at this point, likely had some dispute over mira.
engSearchText:
Said punks then met with a pair of others to deliver it
and, at this point, likely had some dispute over mira.
jpnChrName: 昨夜、“２人組”に渡そうとした時、 恐らく金額面でのトラブルが発生し──
jpnSearchText:
昨夜、“２人組”に渡そうとした時、
恐らく金額面でのトラブルが発生し──

engChrName: That was when the police charged onto the scene, leavin' Giacomo—who called them—to snatch the goods using his RAMDA.
engSearchText:
That was when the police charged onto the scene,
leavin' Giacomo—who called them—to snatch the
goods using his RAMDA.
jpnChrName: 密告で警察が突入した隙を狙って ジャコモがＲＡＭＤＡでチョロまかした。
jpnSearchText:
密告で警察が突入した隙を狙って
ジャコモがＲＡＭＤＡでチョロまかした。

engChrName: But then that pair tracked him down the very next day.
engSearchText:
But then that pair tracked him down the very
next day.
jpnChrName: しかし“２人組”は翌日ジャコモを捕捉。
jpnSearchText: しかし“２人組”は翌日ジャコモを捕捉。

engChrName: They waited in ambush for him at the crime scene, murdered him, then stole his RAMDA and used it to escape.
engSearchText:
They waited in ambush for him at the crime scene,
murdered him, then stole his RAMDA and used it
to escape.
jpnChrName: あの現場で待ち伏せして“制裁”を与えて ＲＡＭＤＡを奪って離脱した。
jpnSearchText:
あの現場で待ち伏せして“制裁”を与えて
ＲＡＭＤＡを奪って離脱した。

engChrName: RAMDAs are like any other kinda computer in that they've got apps to note things down and store info in 'em.
engSearchText:
RAMDAs are like any other kinda computer in that
they've got apps to note things down and store info
in 'em.
jpnChrName: ちなみにＲＡＭＤＡも端末である以上、 各種の情報ツールやメモ用アプリがある。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにＲＡＭＤＡも端末である以上、
各種の情報ツールやメモ用アプリがある。

engChrName: Giacomo was always a cautious one, so I'm sure he wouldn't have made the info too easy to identify...
engSearchText:
Giacomo was always a cautious one, so I'm sure he
wouldn't have made the info too easy to identify...
jpnChrName: あのオッサンのことだ、すぐにそうとは 分からないように工夫してただろうが……
jpnSearchText:
あのオッサンのことだ、すぐにそうとは
分からないように工夫してただろうが……

engChrName: ...but I'm guessin' the locations of his hideouts were on there, so the culprits could use the device to find 'em.
engSearchText:
...but I'm guessin' the locations of his hideouts were
on there, so the culprits could use the device to
find 'em.
jpnChrName: 端末にあった情報から、他の隠れ家の場所を 特定していくのも不可能じゃねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
端末にあった情報から、他の隠れ家の場所を
特定していくのも不可能じゃねえだろう。

engChrName: Do you think his murderers are using the RAMDA to find which spot has what he stole, then?
engSearchText:
Do you think his murderers are using the RAMDA
to find which spot has what he stole, then?
jpnChrName: とすると……その２人組は今も 端末を手がかりに捜しているんですね？
jpnSearchText:
とすると……その２人組は今も
端末を手がかりに捜しているんですね？

engChrName: Pretty much. Fortunately, we've been able to use data on his recent movements to narrow down the top three places it could be.
engSearchText:
Pretty much. Fortunately, we've been able to use data
on his recent movements to narrow down the top
three places it could be.
jpnChrName: ああ、だがこっちは最近のジャコモの 動向も合わせて３箇所まで絞り込めている。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だがこっちは最近のジャコモの
動向も合わせて３箇所まで絞り込めている。

engChrName: One's in front of Trion Tower in the 3rd District, one's near Central Station in the 7th District...
engSearchText:
One's in front of Trion Tower in the 3rd District,
one's near Central Station in the 7th District...
jpnChrName: 三区にある《トリオンタワー》前に 七区にある《イーディス中央駅》──
jpnSearchText:
三区にある《トリオンタワー》前に
七区にある《イーディス中央駅》──

engChrName: ...and then there's one in the 12th District around the Grand Circuit racetrack on the outskirts of town.
engSearchText:
...and then there's one in the 12th District around the
Grand Circuit racetrack on the outskirts of town.
jpnChrName: 街外れにある導力車レース場、 《グランサーキット》周辺の十二区だ。
jpnSearchText:
街外れにある導力車レース場、
《グランサーキット》周辺の十二区だ。

engChrName: Which of 'em would you say is the most fishy?
engSearchText: Which of 'em would you say is the most fishy?
jpnChrName: そこで質問だが── どこがクサいと思う？
jpnSearchText:
そこで質問だが──
どこがクサいと思う？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: そ、そうですね……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうですね……

engChrName: Nah. I think it's safe to rule the tower and the circuit out.
engSearchText:
Nah. I think it's safe to rule the tower and the
circuit out.
jpnChrName: 残念だがトリオンタワーと グランサーキットはマイナス要素がある。
jpnSearchText:
残念だがトリオンタワーと
グランサーキットはマイナス要素がある。

engChrName: Until last night, they were both full of people 'cause of Summer Fest and the Z1 Grand Prix.
engSearchText:
Until last night, they were both full of people 'cause
of Summer Fest and the Z1 Grand Prix.
jpnChrName: 昨日の夜まで、前者はサマーフェスタ、 後者はＺ１グランプリで賑わっていた筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の夜まで、前者はサマーフェスタ、
後者はＺ１グランプリで賑わっていた筈だ。

engChrName: Oh, I see. Having more people than usual would raise the odds of someone seeing him enter his hideout.
engSearchText:
Oh, I see. Having more people than usual would raise
the odds of someone seeing him enter his hideout.
jpnChrName: あ……普段より人が多いと、 目に付きやすい可能性、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
あ……普段より人が多いと、
目に付きやすい可能性、ですか。

engChrName: Exactly. He wouldn't've wanted that.
engSearchText: Exactly. He wouldn't've wanted that.
jpnChrName: ああ、隠れ家の入口が人目に晒される リスクは避けたいだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、隠れ家の入口が人目に晒される
リスクは避けたいだろうからな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Why'd you go with that?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? Why'd you go with that?
jpnChrName: へえ、どうしてそう思う？
jpnSearchText: へえ、どうしてそう思う？

engChrName: Well, Summer Fest was being held in the tower until late last night.
engSearchText:
Well, Summer Fest was being held in the tower until
late last night.
jpnChrName: その、昨日トリオンタワーでは夜まで サマーフェスタがあったと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
その、昨日トリオンタワーでは夜まで
サマーフェスタがあったと思うんです。

engChrName: I believe the Z1 Grand Prix was also being held at the circuit then.
engSearchText:
I believe the Z1 Grand Prix was also being held at the
circuit then.
jpnChrName: それとグランサーキットでは Ｚ１グランプリが開かれていたそうで……
jpnSearchText:
それとグランサーキットでは
Ｚ１グランプリが開かれていたそうで……

engChrName: I can't imagine he would want to risk his hideout being discovered by going inside when there were lots of people around.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine he would want to risk his hideout
being discovered by going inside when there were lots
of people around.
jpnChrName: 普段より人が多いと、隠れ家の入口に 立ち寄るのは避けるのではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
普段より人が多いと、隠れ家の入口に
立ち寄るのは避けるのではないかと。

engChrName: Heh. Nice work.
engSearchText: Heh. Nice work.
jpnChrName: クク、合格だ。
jpnSearchText: クク、合格だ。

engChrName: There's a door down an alley just before the station that leads underground.
engSearchText:
There's a door down an alley just before the station
that leads underground.
jpnChrName: 駅前の路地の目立たない一角に 地下へのゲートがある。
jpnSearchText:
駅前の路地の目立たない一角に
地下へのゲートがある。

engChrName: My guess is Giacomo hid what we're after down there.
engSearchText:
My guess is Giacomo hid what we're after
down there.
jpnChrName: そこにジャコモが“例のブツ”を 隠した可能性が高いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そこにジャコモが“例のブツ”を
隠した可能性が高いだろう。

engChrName: Then that means we should—
engSearchText: Then that means we should—
jpnChrName: ……！ だったらこれから──
jpnSearchText:
……！
だったらこれから──

engChrName: Nah. No 'we.' You're gettin' off at the next stop.
engSearchText: Nah. No 'we.' You're gettin' off at the next stop.
jpnChrName: いいや── あんたは次で降りてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
いいや──
あんたは次で降りてもらおうか。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?

engChrName: Closest station to your dorms, right?
engSearchText: Closest station to your dorms, right?
jpnChrName: 寮暮らしなら次の駅だろう？
jpnSearchText: 寮暮らしなら次の駅だろう？

engChrName: Don't worry. I'll have this thing cracked by the end of the day and the goods with you by tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I'll have this thing cracked by the end of
the day and the goods with you by tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ま、今日中にはケリを付けて 明日には依頼のブツを渡してやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今日中にはケリを付けて
明日には依頼のブツを渡してやるよ。

engChrName: B-But you were fine with me helping you before...
engSearchText: B-But you were fine with me helping you before...
jpnChrName: ……で、でも…… 同行を認めてくださったんじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
……で、でも……
同行を認めてくださったんじゃ？

engChrName: Before. This is now.
engSearchText: Before. This is now.
jpnChrName: 昼間の時点まではな。
jpnSearchText: 昼間の時点まではな。

engChrName: The affiliation of Giacomo's murderers changes everything.
engSearchText:
The affiliation of Giacomo's murderers
changes everything.
jpnChrName: ──だが“二人組”の背景を考えると 流石に一線を引かざるを得ない。
jpnSearchText:
──だが“二人組”の背景を考えると
流石に一線を引かざるを得ない。

engChrName: Are you referring to that 'A' group?
engSearchText: Are you referring to that 'A' group?
jpnChrName: あの人が言っていた…… 《Ａ》という？
jpnSearchText:
あの人が言っていた……
《Ａ》という？

engChrName: Yeah. Everyone is on guard about 'em right now.
engSearchText: Yeah. Everyone is on guard about 'em right now.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここ最近、 各方面から警戒されてる連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ここ最近、
各方面から警戒されてる連中だ。

engChrName: Not just the cops and the guild, either. I'm talkin' other organized crime groups and even jaeger corps.
engSearchText:
Not just the cops and the guild, either. I'm talkin'
other organized crime groups and even jaeger corps.
jpnChrName: それも警察やギルドだけじゃねえ…… 他の犯罪組織やら猟兵などからもな。
jpnSearchText:
それも警察やギルドだけじゃねえ……
他の犯罪組織やら猟兵などからもな。

engChrName: If that's who we're up against, I can't promise I can keep you safe.
engSearchText:
If that's who we're up against, I can't promise I can
keep you safe.
jpnChrName: 仮にそいつらだった場合、 あんたを連れて立ち回れる自信はない。
jpnSearchText:
仮にそいつらだった場合、
あんたを連れて立ち回れる自信はない。

engChrName: So this is what we gotta do. I'm sorry.
engSearchText: So this is what we gotta do. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: だから──そういうことだ。
jpnSearchText: だから──そういうことだ。

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: I thought I told you to get off at the next stop.
engSearchText: I thought I told you to get off at the next stop.
jpnSearchText: ………おい。

engChrName: You'll have to forgive me for being selfish...
engSearchText: You'll have to forgive me for being selfish...
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい……我儘を言って。
jpnSearchText: ごめんなさい……我儘を言って。

engChrName: ...but you have to understand just how much that memento means to me.
engSearchText:
...but you have to understand just how much that
memento means to me.
jpnChrName: でも──あの捜し物は 私にとっては“絆”、なんです。
jpnSearchText:
でも──あの捜し物は
私にとっては“絆”、なんです。

engChrName: It's something that connects me not just to my great-grandfather, but my mother and grandmother, too.
engSearchText:
It's something that connects me not just to my
great-grandfather, but my mother and
grandmother, too.
jpnChrName: ひいお祖父ちゃんだけじゃなく…… お母さんや、お祖母ちゃんとの。
jpnSearchText:
ひいお祖父ちゃんだけじゃなく……
お母さんや、お祖母ちゃんとの。

engChrName: And that's not the only reason I want to see this through now.
engSearchText:
And that's not the only reason I want to see this
through now.
jpnChrName: ……ううん、それだけじゃなくて……
jpnSearchText: ……ううん、それだけじゃなくて……

engChrName: A man is dead. I know you don't like the idea, but...
engSearchText: A man is dead. I know you don't like the idea, but...
jpnChrName: 人が一人、亡くなって…… 足手まといかもしれないですけど。
jpnSearchText:
人が一人、亡くなって……
足手まといかもしれないですけど。

engChrName: ...but I feel like I have to be a part of this. Whatever may come to happen.
engSearchText:
...but I feel like I have to be a part of this.
Whatever may come to happen.
jpnChrName: それでも──自分の目で、足で 最後まで立ち会って見届けたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
それでも──自分の目で、足で
最後まで立ち会って見届けたいんです。

engChrName: I'll do everything I can to ensure my own safety—and I'll do everything you ask in the field.
engSearchText:
I'll do everything I can to ensure my own safety—and
I'll do everything you ask in the field.
jpnChrName: 安全には最大限注意します…… どんな指示にも従えるよう備えます。
jpnSearchText:
安全には最大限注意します……
どんな指示にも従えるよう備えます。

engChrName: So please...won't you let me come with you?
engSearchText: So please...won't you let me come with you?
jpnChrName: ですから………駄目、でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: ですから………駄目、でしょうか？
……………………………

engChrName: Fine. You're the client.
engSearchText: Fine. You're the client.
jpnChrName: しゃあねえ、依頼人（クライアント）はあんただ。
jpnSearchText: しゃあねえ、依頼人（クライアント）はあんただ。

engChrName: I can see you at least know your way around that staff and arts.
engSearchText:
I can see you at least know your way around that staff
and arts.
jpnChrName: 得物にアーツもそれなりに使える。 まったくの足手まといでもねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
得物にアーツもそれなりに使える。
まったくの足手まといでもねえしな。

engChrName: But you're gonna have to do EVERYTHING to keep yourself safe—and if I give you an order, you follow it.
engSearchText:
But you're gonna have to do EVERYTHING to
keep yourself safe—and if I give you an order, you
follow it.
jpnChrName: だが、てめえの安全を最優先しろ。 俺の指示にも即座に従ってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
だが、てめえの安全を最優先しろ。
俺の指示にも即座に従ってもらう。

engChrName: If you fail to do that, I terminate our contract then and there. We clear?
engSearchText:
If you fail to do that, I terminate our contract then
and there. We clear?
jpnChrName: 守れない場合は契約終了だ──いいな？
jpnSearchText: 守れない場合は契約終了だ──いいな？

engChrName: Absolutely! Thank you!
engSearchText: Absolutely! Thank you!
jpnChrName: はいっ……ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……ありがとうございます！
